review: great game very promising for the sequel everything about the game is great except spoiler that goddamn gravball game with achievements i lost count how many times i have to sit straight up and lock in for it i hate it i hate it to the guts spoiler   love it btw give it a try
one of the best modern adventure games if this had been released in the 90s it would have been regarded amongst the broken swordmonkey island level of reverence

if youre into classic pointandclick adventures and scifi youll probably enjoy this one  the game successfully mixes a cyberpunk story with interesting characters and puzzles that are welldesigned offering an immersive experience
great story puzzles were enjoyable the ending was very good and tied things back in well a real adventure wasnt clear that you have to right click in some parts so dont forget to try that

i just lost interest after 4 hours  i think the game is pretty and the voice acting and graphics are good  but in the end i didnt want to keep playing    if youre a pointandclick fan its worth the shot
amazing

4040 achievements it felt good to play a serious point n click adventure game after all the comedy ones this one got a good story puzzles arent obtuse and it doesnt drag on its another wadjet eye classic
it is 10 years old but i should say that this kind of games are ageless for me if you like point n click adventures with a good story baked with sci fi  you will definitly love technobabylon

replayed this for the first time in eight years and its still fab a great scifi pointandclick that owes a lot to other cyberpunk media but still feels fresh and interesting and queer i forgot how queer this game is if youre replaying this then i hugely recommend playing it with the commentary on because this game apparently went through a lot of changes and its always fun seeing how the gamesausage is made

not for the faint of heart which i might count myself to because some scenes are lets say memorable and theres blood too theres some great writing and voice acting as always im still in love with the quality that wadjet eye games have to offer
nice game with a great story
would love a sequel
solid
another very enjoyable adventure game in pixel art well done
i used to think that i wanted exotic scenery and meta humor from adventure games i am not so sure anymore

el que ms me ha gustado de wadjet eye en cuanto a historia y ambientacin los puzzles no son excesivamente complicados ya que el juego est dividido en captulosescenas as que los espacios en los que te puedes mover y los objetos a utilizar son bastante limitados no me he quedado atascada en ninguno es solo cuestion de ir probando y al final se resuelven sin ayuda algo que se agradece
recommended
great game
this is a good game oh my yes

good game builds well as usual with wadjeteye the plot and characters are more sophisticated than most games early on i thought the plot was a bit slow and so so but it really built and by the end i loved it the puzzles were mostly at the right level i heard a sequel was planned though it seems not to have happened would be good to see the developers revive that

this might be my favourite wadjet eyepublished game that ive played so far though all of them are quite excellent so thats not saying much all of the puzzles are quite intuitive the world the characters inhabit is fun and thoughtprovoking and the game doesnt overstay its welcome i look forward to replaying this one eventually and picking other choices

this game slowly reels you in as you try to understand what is going on one or two really difficult puzzles but in the main it is all perfectly solveable by using logic and observation a but over chatty in places where you have to go through reams of conversation but thats also where it creates atmosphere for this point and click recommended if you like that sort of thing

what a charming game i havent finished it yet but i love everything about it it is challenging and frustrating at time ill admit ive had to look some things up when stuck but overall im really enjoying the world characters story and gameplay
a very nice point and click adventure that seems to have taken inspiration from the beloved classic beneath a steel sky
that is such a great story with an amazing atmosphere oh my yes and mr stepford was my favourite character oh my yes
loved it wellwritten and puzzles were mostly logical
another great point and click from the wadjet eye team
what a game

if you love scifi and story rich games then this is a mustplay an absolute masterpiece with welldeveloped characters witty dialogue and a beautifully crafted storyline  ps this game moved me to tears and i think that itself says a lot 3

great scifi thriller cool story and writing indepth characters many cool ideas about our distant or notso distant future the new challenges that human civilization will have to face something to think about highly recommended ps cool music as well
sorry but who had the idea to come up with this pixel mess the font is almost unreadable graphics is really so bad that it just overshadows any positive aspect of this game

eeeeeeh a softthumbsup for this one story  voice acting are good but some scenes are hard to believe and gameplay is worse than unavowed or strangeland which have less moonlogic puzzles and better hint systems buy if youre a fan of the genre and are ready for less mature wadjet
techyesbabylon
good atmosphere but the plot is a bit messy

technobabylon is a captivating cyberpunk adventure game it features an amazing story wonderful art a nice atmosphere good music and great voice acting i did not expect to enjoy the story so much it really had me engaged and wanting to see where it was going well done

a good adventure game with nice visuals voice acting and sound design that avoids the adventure game puzzle logic and makes the world feel real and lived in despite its short time i completed it in 6 and a half hours and was happy with the time spent

i find modern pca games a lot more miss than hit most tend to nail certain elements of the genre but fall over hard at others however technobabylon is an exception and easily my favorite modern pca game to date everything key to the genre  from presentation to puzzles to dialogue  is done to a very high standard here with the game itself having great pacing and some very interesting moments too   highly recommended

i really enjoyed this game and consider it one of the best point and clicks ive played the story is engaging the puzzles are challenging but not frustrating and the overall ambience nails the cyberpunk genre the voice acting is well done on top dont be put off by the old school graphics give this your attention

one of my favorite adventure games ever  i had avoided it because the cover seemed weird turns out it was just a cropped part of a beautiful illustration and its weird because its the online avatar of the teen protagonist  game is amazing great art great worldbuilding great ideas for the mechanics i need more
this is honestly one of the best cyberpunk pointandclicks ever fantastic design emotional storyline super immersive an absolute mustplay

it reminded me a bit of ready player one the setting concept and characters are interesting unfortunately i cannot recommend playing this game because the second half of the game ruins the gameplay the dialogues are too long they throw you a lot of exposition and some puzzles do not make sense even when looking at a walkthrough

great story great characters even the graphics are decent all in all a nearly flawless wadjet eye entry a few puzzles were frustrating but youll probably forget about them the whole thing holds together cohesively
epic story love it
some annoying puzzles but otherwise a great story really picks up after the opening
surprisingly good the plot is excellent it has that philip k dick vibe all over it
a gem of an adventure gamenice world building a compelling story characters with depth solid music and voice acting if you like this genre you will definitely enjoy technobabylon
very good storyline better than cyberpunk tbh gameplay could be improved tho it forces you to meta gaming sometimes
everything about this just feels right on the money from the pixel art to the voice acting to the general vibe and aesthetic really lovely stuff

overall a great adventure game with clever puzzles and good visual and audio design  honestly there were quite a few places where i felt i got stuck just because i didnt know that something was interactable or required a pixelperfect interaction also the end game was quite buggy though nothing gamebreaking   nevertheless on the whole i thought this was an enjoyable experience and would recommend

when i found wadjet eye games a few years ago i know i had found not gold but diamonds they release masterpiece after masterpiece and this is one of my favorite ones of all times honestly fantastic just like every other game they released im a huge fan lets go wadjet eye

id really only recommend this to die hard point and click fans great story with a lot packed into it could use some qol fixes like double clicking to warp to the next scene or a minor hint system  but a soild a game with some cool puzzles looking forward to the sequel

one of my favorite games of all time  pros  beatiful pixel art  capitvating story  riddles are mostly logical and satisfying to solve  manages to create a dense blade runner like atmaosphere  cons  i forgot about the cons it has been a while since i played it sry

technobabylon is a thrilling cyberpunk puzzle experience the pacing and narrative flow are really good and the puzzles are great and logical the world and characters are so memorable its mood carries through from start to finish a great starting for pointandclick beginners  and theyre even more likely to become pnc addicts that way

if you hadnt told me this game was from 2015 i would have assumed it was one of the classics from the late 90s that i hadnt played the art and soundtrack really sell an interesting world and the voice acting is amateurish in a way that makes it feel older rather than badly made very little backtracking and the story is interesting as well overall a very nice package hope the dev makes something new eventually
if there was a middle button i would click that  not as strong as the other titles from the developer
great lil game had a few bugs at the end but solid story and puzzles not much handholding
a remarkable sci fi story with some interesting applications of the simple point and click mechanic
point and click cyberpunk masterpiece
excelent adventure game

bought it loved it hope to forget it so i can play it again for the first time  the story was very fun to be a part of character bios are great voice actors are spot on not at all annoying would love to say more but wouldnt dare risk any spoilers go play and find out for yourself you will not be disappointed   missbos
yes
oh my yes
wetware

nice traditional pointandclick with mainly interesting story i did not get certain reactions from the player characters especially the central motivation for one of them and why it was so important but i guess the writing did reveal it towards the end to be a pain point for the character otherwise very nice mood setting and plot execution is good pacing great music nostalgic and ui mostly a breeze
nice little retro adventure game
great point  click adventure in oldschool style wellthoughtout scificyberpunk story extremely good atmosphere good voice actors subjectively some quite tricky puzzles fun to play highly recommended

nice athmosphere interesting story well realized cyberpunksetting reminds me a lot of the classic beneath a steel sky my main critique ist the switchting between 3 main characters i prefer to play games from start to finish in the eyes of a single character but i suppose this is completely subjective
great atmosphere and story definitely left me thinking about it for a long time after completing it worth your time

excellent another great point and click from wadjet eye exploring some interesting themes with a plot that is twisty enough but possible to figure out along the way as well great dialogue and voice acting as always

addicting for those of us missing old school point and click problem solving and  lucasarts and sierra graphics of the mid 80s 45 hours in and i need to stop and actually go do my dishes if you liked space quest darkside detective or thimbleweed park then this fits right in
every now and then i replay this and i still enjoy it  really well written story and characters
a couple interesting dystopian ideas solid pointandclick the story held my attention
good game good story this is a great pointandclick puzzle adventure
intriguing cyberpunk transhumanist storyline great voice acting and moderatehard puzzles whats there not to like
highly recommended to anyone who enjoys great worldbuilding good characters good plot and nottootough puzzles
good story cyberpunk flavour and tasteful pixel art clever but not overly difficult puzzles and many different trophies to get
very nice game

a very cool pointandclick adventure set in a futuristic blade runneresque setting with challenging and sometimes obtuse puzzles  although the voice acting can sometimes be tacky the worldbuilding is fantastic  definitely check this out if you enjoyed beneath a steel sky or the cyber punk genre overall
another amazing game by wadjet eye maybe one of their best love the well built characters and the william gibson vibes cyberpunk is finally back
its very good good story good atmosphere good puzzles interesting characters easily one of the better point  clicks i cant think of any flaws big enough to be mentioned
a great point and click with competent sci fi writing good balance of exploring speculative concepts and keeping the plot tight good robot content enjoyed overall

it is fun and interesting game not as good as blackwell or unawoved but still enjoyable and with great voice acting as usual with wadjeteyes games i think the game could be a bit shorter some parts seemed like puzzling for the sake of puzzling especially mandalas parts but overall i enjoyed technobabylon

i would pass on this one huge credit to wadjet eye games for keeping point and click alive and blackwell is brilliant but they fall in to the trap of making the player read through mails on the characters phone and navigatin irritating systems in game they should go back and look at blackwell 2 and 3 and make games like that
a modern take on an old genre highly recommended

technobablyon is probably on the weaker side of the wadjet eye games catalog being on the buggier side and having a predictable plot twist still technobabylons cyberpunk dystopian conspiracy story was entertaining enough to interest me until i finished the game

great story most puzzles are good amazing soundscapes graphics better than most in the genre make the sequel please

great story so far
hyperfixating on cheffie the chef

very enjoyable point n click adventure  nice story nice flow easy controls if you like adventure games pixel art voice acting then this is a must have in your collection  if its on discount even better
1010 if you enjoy point  click games with a sort of noir cyberpunk dystopia think pixelated blade runner youll love this

the writing and voice acting is quite good especially considering the size of the production there are a few times where i got frustrated there is a lot of trial and error and retreading your steps trying to figure things out but overall this was a great story arc despite the annoyances thumbs way up

very great game focus on details and the plot is very interesting sometimes the leads are hard to find but other than that its wonderfuld

what an incredibly wellwritten game  has interesting characters well thoughtout world building and a gripping plot  for the most part the puzzles are good although the lack of hotspot visibility meant that there were a few times where i got stuck because i didnt realize i could interact with some object  not too much else to say other than that this is an easy recommend and even easier if youre into the scificyberpunk genre
great story and interesting gameplay youll love it
tricky funny good worldbuilding and ambience

oh my yes
a very good rendition of cyberpunk themes and the usual very high production value from wadjeteye games
i love point and click adventures this has an interesting story and some really interesting world building in a dystopian future society
take control of three characters all living in a technologically advanced metropolis run by an ai youll explore everything from restaurants for the rich to depressing and dirty drug dens
amazing story characters and setting among the top 5 adventure games ever made

you know what its a pretty cool game it has interesting characters well developed plot and mostly logical puzzles i had to look stuff up but not too often  regretfully my characters got physically stuck twice and i had to load autosave but its fine
nice storyline and music
amazing story and satisfying for solving pazzles especially if you are a developer

the cyberpunk storyline is interesting albeit a little convoluted excellent world building interesting and varied puzzles and most were logical though some interactive elements dont stand out from their backgrounds so i found myself stuck and pixel hunting more often than id like
it took an hour or so to get used to the playstyle  it seemed dull with nothing to draw me in at the start however it really picked up for me and i enjoyed playing it in short sessions
amazing atmosphere and cool puzzles havent finished yet but its been a blast so far

an old fashioned point and click adventure with a modern touch a nice story which masterfully unfolds before your eyes in this dystopian and somewhat dark world the puzzles are fair never too hard unless you are completely new to the genre maybe a taste of another era when games where made with passion and love
old school point and click plays amazingly on the steam deck highly recommended

behind its pixels is a gloriously mature cyberpunk game the characters  voice actors are superb moments of anger sarcasm surprise futility theres never a dull conversation  some nice outofthebox puzzles using future tech and consoles a perfect moody soundtrack occasional hilarious jokes  poor soldiers   if you happen to like point nclick adventure games and cyberpunk this will be your game of the year
incredible story great voice acting and an indepth rich world doesnt have a ton of replay value and i definitely needed a walkthrough but i still ihighlyi recommend it
amazingly well done

really really good it has an original and thoughtprovoking setting the gameplay is unremarkable runof the mill pointandclick but the creative setting and environments make up for that if you enjoy pointandclicks or want to try them out this is a good one
